modules.name: Bernoulli Switch
modules.description: Randomly route two inputs to two outputs, with built in scaling and offset capabilities

modules.name: Bernoulli Switch Expander
modules.description: Additional CV inputs and attenuators for Bernoulli Switch

modules.name: Clone Merge
modules.description: Clone up to 8 monophonic inputs and merge all channels into 1 polyphonic output

modules.name: HQ - Harmonic Quantizer
modules.description: Computes a selected harmonic or subharmonic partial relative to a root V/Oct, or quantizes input V/Oct to the nearest partial relative to the root

modules.name: Mix 4
modules.description: Compact audio or CV mixer, attenuator, inverter, amplifier, and/or offset

modules.name: Mix 4 Stereo
modules.description: Stereo compact audio or CV mixer, attenuator, inverter, amplifier, and/or offset

modules.name: Poly Clone
modules.description: Clone each channel of a polyphonic input and merge the results into a single polyphonic output

modules.name: Poly Unison
modules.description: Replicate each channel of a polyphonic input with a variable detune spread, and merge the results into a single polyphonic output

modules.name: Recurse
modules.description: Recursively process an input via Send/Return, with built in scaling and offset cababilities

modules.name: Recurse Stereo
modules.description: Recursively process mono or stereo input via Send/Return, with built in scaling and offset cababilities

modules.name: Reformation
modules.description: Transform CV or audio by mapping way point voltages to new values

modules.name: Rhythm Explorer
modules.description: Random rhythm generator, trigger sequencer and clock divider

modules.name: Shaped VCA
modules.description: Stereo VCA with a variable response curve, hard/soft clipping, ring modulation, and oversampling

modules.name: VCA Mix 4
modules.description: Compact audio or CV VCA, mixer, attenuator, inverter, amplifier, and/or offset

modules.name: VCA Mix 4 Stereo
modules.description: Stereo compact audio or CV VCA, mixer, attenuator, inverter, amplifier, and/or offset
